short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the option to select tenant from tenants used before

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Working with several OCI (Oracle Cloud Infrastructure) tenants and can’t remember them? 

This extension is for you!

This extension adds autocomplete for the tenant input field on the OCI login page (https://www.oracle.com/cloud/sign-in.html) 

After installing this extension, say no more for remembering all tenants name / opening new chrome profile.
Login once by typing the tenant name, next time you login just “double click” on the input field, and the see the list of all tenants used in this browser
OR start typing the tenant name and see it’s autocomplete 

Very useful for Cloud Architects and Engineers that are working with several OCI accounts
